title: Skins for champions who have not gotten any recently
body: Shaco had quite a bit of skins, but he's a clown and none of his skins are funny or tilt inducing. How about a genuine clown skin or something remotely funny definitely not shaco or something

replies.body: Think about Vladimir, is being like 2 years
Annie needs new skins. She hasn't gotten a skin in ages and she has, like, no skins.

Riot said they are focusing more on champs with little to no new skins for now, though I cant seem to find the article.

Hence why Yorick, Cassiopeia and Singed got random skins out of nowhere. (arclight. eternum and bee keeper)

Pretty sure Riot said Illaoi, Swain (after his rework) and Ivern are top of the list but again, they need to have "good" ideas that fit the champion for skins to be made.

Viktor also got a Deathsworn skin. 

And you are right about Illaoi. There was a voting poll a few weeks ago about 3 versions of an Illaoi skin.
Eve could do with a new skin. Heartseeker on her seems appropriate :)
Riot said they weren't giving her skins until her rework. So hopefully that means we will see one soon.
